channel.title: Please help :D
channel.description: I downlaoded bat scape :D. Can somone please tell me how to make it so people cant pickup certain items unless they are staff? Thank you helpers!

item.title: Please help :D
item.dc:creator: @Nathan8888 Nathan8888
item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

Could somone help me on this please

if (cmd[0].equals(“item”)) { if (p.rights <= 0) { for (int i = 0; i < p.economyItems.length; i++) { if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == p.economyItems[i]) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, p.getMessageString(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]))); return; } } if (p.wildernessZone(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot spawn items in the wilderness.”); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); }

Read full topic

item.title: Please help :D
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Well, you’ll have to turn off the pickup command. Or just make the player rihts 1-3. And I think you can add this into item.java public static final int[] staff_items = {8002, 8772, 8776, 8775, 8774 }; Or something like that.
